snippet.title: Sea Salt -  Minion Feature Trailer (Release Date)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/983350/Sea_Salt/
Follow Sea Salt on Twitter - https://twitter.com/YCJYgames

Release Date - 17th of October, 2019.
PC, Switch, & XboxOne

Sea Salt is a Gothic fantasy reverse horror action-strategy game where you play as the nightmarish force of Dagon by controlling and growing a horde of minions.

You are Dagon, The Old God, the Eldritch force of the sea. By using tarot cards you add to your horde of cultists, monsters and other ghastly beings. As you progress through the story you unlock new minions that get added to your pool of cards. 

Thanks for watching!
Sea Salt is coming to PC via Steam, Gog, and Humble on the 17th of October, 2019.

Sincerely, Christopher and Josef
Y/CJ/Y
